channel.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
channel.description:
When I read that the game was delayed a whole month for PC, I considered getting it for the PS3.
[url='https://store.steampowered.com/app/57400/']Then this happened.[/url]
Steamworks and pre-order discount if you already have Arkham Asylum? Hell yeah, bro. For shit like this I can wait another month.

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
at first I was all “FFFFUUUUUUUUUUU, not another month of waiting!”
then I saw this and I was all “hell yeah!”
Time to cancel another Pre-order from Gamestop. Thats two orders they’ve lost from me to Steam this year, I wonder if the PC version of the Jurassic Park game will be available for Pre-order on Steam or Telltale before Gamestop?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Just beat the game. Glorious.

When you beat it too, check the joker’s hideout room besides harley’s doctor outfit and look at the floor. I’m POSITIVE you’ll be surprised.

item.description:

Arkham Asylum is amazing though.

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I never play 360 and don’t really care. I’ve been trying to restart but don’t know how to sign in. Nothing pops up when I start it and I’m too lazy to look up the command to being the GFWL bar up.

Read full topic

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Kairouseki:

When I first got it I got right into playing it when I first started it up without seeing any GFWL stuff. Shortly after I bought Red Faction Guerilla (well the RF pack) and when I started it up it made me create a GFWL account, so I did. Shortly after, when I started AA back up it signed into the GFWL account I started for RF and now I can’t go back to playing the game I already had because I guess it was an offline account and I don’t know how to log back into it if it’s even possible.

Just man up and start it from the beginning again. Besides, you get achievements this way and they count for your Xbox gamerscore.

Read full topic

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
And all of this is put on top of the fact it serves absolutely no purpose in a Steam game. Thats the biggest problem here.

I bought AA .

https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198008633244/games?tab=all

If you bought it then what’s the issue with it logging you in? I don’t see why it’s that big a bother. I just have it set to automatically log me in and I never bother with it.

item.title: Arkham City PC -Hell fucking yes
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I started with an offline account and then when I was forced to log in for Red Faction it started logging me in for Batman and I can’t play my offline account game. That’s pretty much the reason I stopped playing it because I didn’t feel like bothering with it.

If there’s a way to go back to my offline account please tell me.
